chapters.title: Foundations of Algebra
chapters.summary: Introduction to basic algebraic concepts including variables, expressions, and equations.

pages.title: What are Variables?
pages.body: Variables are symbols used to represent unknown values...

pages.title: Using Variables in Expressions
pages.body: Learn how variables are used in algebraic expressions...

pages.title: Writing Expressions
pages.body: Learn how to write algebraic expressions...

pages.title: Simplifying Expressions
pages.body: Learn how to simplify algebraic expressions...

pages.title: Solving Simple Equations
pages.body: Learn how to solve simple algebraic equations...

pages.title: Understanding Equality
pages.body: Understand the concept of equality in algebra...

chapters.title: Operations with Numbers and Variables
chapters.summary: Explore operations with real numbers and variables including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

pages.title: Adding and Subtracting Numbers
pages.body: Learn how to add and subtract real numbers...

pages.title: Adding and Subtracting Variables
pages.body: Learn how to add and subtract algebraic terms...

pages.title: Multiplying and Dividing Numbers
pages.body: Learn how to multiply and divide real numbers...

pages.title: Multiplying and Dividing Variables
pages.body: Learn how to multiply and divide algebraic terms...

pages.title: Understanding PEMDAS
pages.body: Learn the order of operations using PEMDAS...

pages.title: Applying Order of Operations
pages.body: Apply the order of operations in complex expressions...

chapters.title: Solving Equations
chapters.summary: Learn how to solve linear equations and understand the principles behind solving equations.

pages.title: Solving One-Step Equations
pages.body: Learn how to solve equations that require only one operation...

pages.title: Understanding Inverse Operations
pages.body: Understand the role of inverse operations in solving equations...

pages.title: Solving Two-Step Equations
pages.body: Learn how to solve equations that require two operations...

pages.title: Checking Solutions
pages.body: Learn how to check if your solution is correct...

sections.title: Equations with Variables on Both Sides

pages.title: Balancing Equations
pages.body: Learn how to solve equations with variables on both sides...

pages.title: Understanding Solutions to Equations
pages.body: Understand different types of solutions for linear equations...

chapters.title: Introduction to Inequalities
chapters.summary: Explore the basics of inequalities and how to solve them.

pages.title: What are Inequalities?
pages.body: Learn what inequalities are and how they differ from equations...

pages.title: Graphing Inequalities
pages.body: Learn how to graph inequalities on a number line...

pages.title: Solving Inequalities with Addition and Subtraction
pages.body: Learn how to solve one-step inequalities using addition and subtraction...

pages.title: Solving Inequalities with Multiplication and Division
pages.body: Learn how to solve one-step inequalities using multiplication and division...

pages.title: Solving Compound Inequalities
pages.body: Learn how to solve compound inequalities involving 'and' and 'or'...

pages.title: Graphing Compound Inequalities
pages.body: Learn how to graph the solution sets of compound inequalities...
